name: Bedtime Stories, an improvised story podcast for kids!
blurb: An imaginative storytelling podcast for kids (and grown up kids) using original folktales, improv comics, music and silly, silly fun!

name: Joy to the World! Children's CD Holiday Gift, Book to Follow
blurb: Mr Bus Driver Man Sir and Her wrap up a children's CD to spread musical joy for the holidays, and will follow up with a colorful book

name: Empowering Young Artists to Pursue a Life-long Love of Music
blurb: Creating an amazing music experience for young musicians and families who can't create it for themselves: Young Musicians Association

name: School of Music Montreal - Instruments for at-risk youth.
blurb: SoMM provides free music education and instruments to youth in order to foster and create a supportive and safe learning environment.

name: Preschool Prodigies: Early Childhood Music Reimagined
blurb: Preschool Prodigies is pre-selling high quality Deskbells for 2017 AND developing an affordable and digital bell alternative!

name: Just Be You! A New Kid's Album from In A World...
blurb: 10 new original children's songs! Music and puppet videos to inspire kids to learn, move and have fun!

name: Stowaways EP
blurb: We're releasing a short album of childrens songs for our children's ministry and our local community. We want it to be free for them!

name: Noteworthy Students
blurb: A violin and viola scholarship fund for public school students in Pontiac, MI.

name: SONGS FOR EXTRAORDINARY PEOPLE the album, needs your help.
blurb: Songs about some of the world's most fascinating individuals. Including Stagecoach Mary, Ibn Battuta, Jane Goodall, and Evel Knievel.

name: Megan Schoenbohm's Debut Children's Album: Bubba & Boo
blurb: A unique blend of indie, pop & folk influences intermix to create an album that will captivate both parents & children of all ages.

name: • I DREAM OF YOU (Volume II) • Lullabies For All Ages
blurb: JJ Heller is creating her 2nd lullaby album featuring 15 beautifully crafted songs to bring hope and peace to generations of listeners!

name: Clara Crocodile
blurb: A children's album about one crocodile trying to find her home in the Australian Outback.

name: Creature Teachers
blurb: A professional quality kid's music album based on animals from the Bible that adults will love too.

name: Ira Pettle: A Little Bit
blurb: Help Ira launch his debut record!
